entry.title: Slatwall panel short groove
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ablelin Store Fixtures Corp.
Type: Slatwall displays and accessories
Price: 115.00 - 225.00 (8 variants)

Slatwall panel system is widely used for merchandise display and storage. Short groove panels are constructed of 3/4 inch medium density fibreboard (MDF),4' long, and 8' high.

Short groove Slatwall panels are available in a variety of finishes. Each Slatwall panel contains routed 4 feet grooves, spaced every 3 inches for placement of Slatwall accessories. Aluminum or plastic inserts are available.

This item can only be picked up by the customer or delivered local Toronto area due to the size of the product.

entry.title: Slatwall panel long groove
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ablelin Store Fixtures Corp.
Type: Slatwall displays and accessories
Price: 115.00 - 225.00 (8 variants)

Slatwall panel system is widely used for merchandise display and storage. Panels are constructed of 3/4 inch medium density fibreboard (MDF),8' long and 4' high.

Long groove Slatwall panels are available in a variety of finishes. Each Slatwall panel contains routed 8 feet long grooves, spaced every 3 inches for placement of Slatwall accessories. Aluminum or plastic inserts are available.

This item can only be picked up by the customer or delivered local Toronto area due to the size of the product.
